function.name: GetAllHeroes
function.DescriptionEN: Returns all the heroes in the world
function.DescriptionCN: 返回当前世界全部英雄

function.name: GetHero
function.DescriptionEN: Get the Nth hero in the Hero List
function.DescriptionCN: 获取英雄列表中第N位英雄

function.name: GetHeroCount
function.DescriptionEN: Returns the number of heroes in the world
function.DescriptionCN: 返回当前世界英雄数目
